title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
Covino and Rich fill in for Dan Patrick and the crew. They recap Covino’s spoiler on Thursday night regarding his Yankees on the heels of a walk-off grand slam by Josh Donaldson. Rich is super pumped about one Mets player who hit a homerun in his first Major League at bat, but not for the actual hitting of the homerun. LeBron James’ new contract brings up a question: would you give handouts to your friends if you were mega-mega rich?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
